CustomField.description: This is a concatenation field of name of card, category, due date, percent complete.
CustomField.formula: Name & ", Category: " & leankor__KanbanCardTemplate__r.leankor__Title__c & ", Card Due Date: " & TEXT(DATEVALUE(leankor__DueDateTime__c)) & ", Percent Complete:" & TEXT(leankor__PercentComplete2__c*100) &"%"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a concatenation field of name of card, category, due date, percent complete.
CustomField.label: Card Details
